sense.gloss: arrival (e.g. of spring), advent, coming, appearance
to arrive (season, time, situation, etc.), to come, to appear
to send a letter, to inquire about a letter
to blame (someone) for, to accuse of, to pursue (question of responsibility), to charge with
to care about, to regard as important
to call into question, to doubt, to question
to visit, to call on, to pay a visit to
searching, hunting for news story, journalist

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓は↑彼↑↓かれ↓を↑訪問↑↓ほうもん↓した↑方↑↓ほう↓がよいと↑思↑↓おも↓う。
sdata.e: I think you had better call on him.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓はお↑父↑↓とう↓さんの↑生↑↓う↓まれ↑故郷↑↓こきょう↓を↑訪↑↓たず↓ねたことがありますか。
sdata.e: Have you visited the town where your father was born?

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓はお↑父↑↓とう↓さんが↑働↑↓はたら↓いている↑会社↑↓かいしゃ↓を↑訪↑↓おとず↓れたことがあるかい。
sdata.e: Have you ever visited the office where your father works?

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓がその↑美術館↑↓びじゅつかん↓を↑訪↑↓たず↓ねたのはいつだったのか。
sdata.e: When was it that you visited the museum?

sdata.j: ↑近頃↑↓ちかごろ↓は↑私↑↓わたし↓を↑訪↑↓たず↓ねるひともほとんどいない。
sdata.e: Few people visit me these days.

sdata.j: ↑近↑↓ちか↓いうちに↑春↑↓はる↓が↑当地↑↓とうち↓に↑訪↑↓おとず↓れるだろう。
sdata.e: Spring will be here before long.

sdata.j: まもなく↑春↑↓はる↓が↑訪↑↓おとず↓れるだろう。
sdata.e: Spring will be here before long.

sdata.j: ↑近↑↓ちか↓いうちにお↑訪↑↓たず↓ねします。
sdata.e: I'll come and see you one of these days.

sdata.j: ↑近↑↓ちか↓いうちにお↑訪↑↓たず↓ねしたいと↑思↑↓おも↓います。
sdata.e: I would like to call on you one of these days.

sdata.j: ↑近↑↓ちか↓いうちにあなたを↑訪↑↓たず↓ねようかと↑思↑↓おも↓っています。
sdata.e: I'm thinking of visiting you one of these days.
